alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Jefferson; Ozaukee; Washington; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ozaukee, southeastern Columbia, northwestern Waukesha, Washington, northeastern Dane, northern Jefferson and southern Dodge Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Theresa to 6 miles south of Beaver Dam to near Lodi. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Menomonee Falls, West Bend, Sun Prairie, Fitchburg, Watertown, Mequon, Beaver Dam, Hartford, Waunakee, Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Sussex, Hartland, Jefferson, McFarland, Monona, Delafield, and Jackson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 113 and 137. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 263 and 273. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 98 and 132. Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 138 and 149. Interstate 94 between mile markers 241 and 282. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 29 and 53. Interstate 43 between mile markers 87 and 97. Interstate 41 between mile markers 52 and 73. U.S. Highway 45 between mile markers 61 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Jefferson; Ozaukee; Washington; Waukesha
